resources.string: The intent is defined by user?

string-array.name: books
string-array.item: Maharishi’s Yoga Volume II : Yoga and Vedānta (European shipping only)
W.F. Sands, PhD", "Vernon Katz, D.Phil. (Oxon), author, Conversations with Maharishi, Volumes 1 and 2
In Volume I of Maharishi’s Yoga, we were introduced to Maharishi’s vision of Yoga and its distinction between Yoga practice and the inner state of Yoga

the silent field of pure wakefulness lying deep within the human mind. We also learned of the many misconceptions found in modern interpretations of Yoga, which have undermined the effectiveness of Yoga practices
In Volume II, Dr. Sands
Robert Keith Wallace, Ph.D., author, The Physiology of Consciousness and The Neurophysiology of Enlightenment
In Stock
